load library

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
```

FUNDER_raw_microarthropod_core_depths_2022.csv
```{r}
raw <- read.csv("../Raw/FUNDER_raw_microarthropod_core_depths_2022.csv", sep = ";"); head(raw)

clean <- raw %>% 
  mutate(Site = str_to_title(Site),
         siteID = recode(Site, 
                         'Gud' = "Gudmedalen",
                         'Lav' = "Lavisdalen",
                         'Ram' = "Rambera",
                         'Ulv' = "Ulvehaugen",
                         'Skj' = "Skjelingahaugen",
                         'Alr' = "Alrust",
                         'Arh' = "Arhelleren",
                         'Fau' = "Fauske",
                         'Hog' = "Hogsete",
                         'Ovs' = "Ovstedalen",
                         'Vik' = "Vikesland",
                         'Ves' = "Veskre"),
         core_depth = sub(",", ".", core_depth),
         core_depth = as.numeric(core_depth), 
         Block = paste0(Site, Block),
         plotID = paste0(Block, treatment)) %>% 
  rename(blockID = Block, 
         core_depth_cm = core_depth) %>% 
  select(-ID, -Site) %>% 
  mutate(year = "2022") %>% 
  relocate(year, siteID, blockID, treatment, plotID, core_depth_cm, comment) 

write.csv(clean, "../Clean/FUNDER_clean_microarthropod_core_depths_2022.csv")
```

FUNDER_raw_beforeburrying_litter_biomass_2021.xlsx
```{r}


raw <- data.frame(read_xlsx("../Raw/Data/Datasets_from_Karolina_and_Morgane/Raw/FUNDER_raw_beforeburrying_litter_biomass_2021.xlsx", 
                 col_types = c(rep("text", times = 4), 
                 "numeric", 
                 "text", 
                 rep("numeric", times = 3),
                 "text", 
                 rep("numeric", times = 2),
                 rep("text", times = 2))))
str(raw); head(raw)

clean <- raw %>% 
  mutate(siteID = recode(site, 
                         'Gud' = "Gudmedalen",
                         'Lav' = "Lavisdalen",
                         'Ram' = "Rambera",
                         'Ulv' = "Ulvehaugen",
                         'Skj' = "Skjelingahaugen",
                         'Alr' = "Alrust",
                         'Arh' = "Arhelleren",
                         'Fau' = "Fauske",
                         'Hog' = "Hogsete",
                         'Ovs' = "Ovstedalen",
                         'Vik' = "Vikesland",
                         'Ves' = "Veskre"), 
         block = as.factor(block), 
         native_graminoids = as.numeric(native_graminoids), 
         graminoids_before_burying = as.numeric(graminoids_before_burying)) %>% 
  mutate(year = "2022", .before = 1) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(added_forbs, 
                        added_graminoids),
               values_to = "added", 
               names_to = "functional_group") %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(native_forbs, 
                        native_graminoids), 
               values_to = "native", 
               #names_to = "functional_group"
               ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(forb_addition_site, 
                        graminoid_addition_site), 
               values_to = "addition_site", 
               names_to = "functional_group")


head(clean)

write.csv(clean, "C:/Users/pgfar/Dropbox/pgfarsund/FUNDER/Data/Datasets_from_Karolina_and_Morgane/Clean/FUNDER_clean_beforeburrying_litter_biomass_2021.xlsx")
```

FUNDER_raw_beforeburrying_tea_bags_2021.xlsx
```{r}
raw <- read_xlsx("../Raw/Data/Datasets_from_Karolina_and_Morgane/Raw/FUNDER_raw_beforeburrying_tea_bags_weight_2021.xlsx", col_types = c(rep("text", times = 5), "numeric", rep("date", times = 2))) # mind the two date columns
str(raw)

# clean

clean <- raw %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(siteID = recode(site, 
                         'Gud' = "Gudmedalen",
                         'Lav' = "Lavisdalen",
                         'Ram' = "Rambera",
                         'Ulv' = "Ulvehaugen",
                         'Skj' = "Skjelingahaugen",
                         'Alr' = "Alrust",
                         'Arh' = "Arhelleren",
                         'Fau' = "Fauske",
                         'Hog' = "Hogsete",
                         'Ovs' = "Ovstedalen",
                         'Vik' = "Vikesland",
                         'Ves' = "Veskre"),
         blockID = paste0(site, block), 
         plotID = paste0(site, block, treatment), 
         tea_type = tolower(tea_type), 
         tea_type = str_replace_all(tea_type,
                                    c("gre" = "green", 
                                      "hib" = "rooibos_hibiscus"))) %>% 
  select(-site, -block) %>%
  relocate(year, siteID, blockID, treatment, plotID, tea_type, weight_g, 
           burial_date, retrieval_date); head(clean)

write.csv(clean, "C:/Users/pgfar/Dropbox/pgfarsund/FUNDER/Data/Datasets_from_Karolina_and_Morgane/Clean/FUNDER_clean_beforeburrying_tea_bags_weight_2021.csv")

clean %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=tea_type, y=weight_g, fill=tea_type)) + 
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3)

```


FUNDER_raw_beforeburrying_tea_bags_2022.xlsx
```{r}
raw <- read_xlsx("../Raw/Data/Datasets_from_Karolina_and_Morgane/Raw/FUNDER_raw_beforeburrying_tea_bags_weight_2022.xlsx", col_types = c(rep("guess", times = 6), "numeric", rep("date", times = 2))) # mind the two date columns
head(raw)

clean <- raw %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  #filter(!str_detect(site, "Substitu")) %>% 
  mutate(siteID = recode(site, 
                         'Gud' = "Gudmedalen",
                         'Lav' = "Lavisdalen",
                         'Ram' = "Rambera",
                         'Ulv' = "Ulvehaugen",
                         'Skj' = "Skjelingahaugen",
                         'Alr' = "Alrust",
                         'Arh' = "Arhelleren",
                         'Fau' = "Fauske",
                         'Hog' = "Hogsete",
                         'Ovs' = "Ovstedalen",
                         'Vik' = "Vikesland",
                         'Ves' = "Veskre"),
         blockID = paste0(site, block), 
         plotID = paste0(site, block, treatment),
         year = "2022", 
         tea_type = tolower(tea_type), 
         tea_type = sub("roiboos", "rooibos", tea_type)) %>% 
  select(-site, -block) %>%
  relocate(year, siteID, blockID, treatment, plotID, replicate, tea_type, 
           weight_g, burial_date, retrieval_date) %>% 
  rename(fresh_weight_g = weight_g); head(clean)

write.csv(clean, "C:/Users/pgfar/Dropbox/pgfarsund/FUNDER/Data/Datasets_from_Karolina_and_Morgane/Clean/FUNDER_clean_beforeburrying_tea_bags_weight_2022.csv")
```
